description: This file is a header file (.h) defining the exported APIs and functions related to the DSLH TCP Connection Request Handler component within a DSL Home Model implementation. It contains function prototypes for creation, removal, and initialization of the object, indicating it declares interface points for this component.

methods.name: DslhCreateTcpConnReqHandler
methods.description: Creates a new TCP Connection Request Handler object with provided container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: DslhTcpcrhoCreate
methods.description: Creates and initializes a TCP Connection Request Handler object with specified contexts.

methods.name: DslhTcpcrhoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified TCP Connection Request Handler object.

methods.name: DslhTcpcrhoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls the necessary objects for the TCP Connection Request Handler.

methods.name: DslhTcpcrhoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the TCP Connection Request Handler object.
